ca.ualberta.taskr.adapters

Class MyBidsListAdapter

  • ca.ualberta.taskr.adapters.MyBidsListAdapter

  • public class MyBidsListAdapter

    BidListAdapter Class. This class takes in an ArrayList of Bids and produces a RecyclerView.Adapter for displaying the views of bids put out by a specific User

    See Also:
    ArrayList, User
